configurations.value:
{
    "name": "LaceworkConfiguration",
    "rec_id": "LW_S3_10",
    "violationdescription": "Ensure the S3 bucket ACL does not grant AWS users FULL_CONTROL [READ, WRITE, READ_ACP, WRITE_ACP]",

    "tagname": "LW_S3_10",
    "tagvalue": "suppressed",
    "configuresuppressiononpolicy": "false",

    "autoremediationonlyfornewviolations": "false",
    "suppressionuuid": "57b4a274-e264-47a9-a24d-34bfcf6ac885"
}
